episodes.natural_language:
Initial client contact on November 17, 2025 with Antonio Lopez regarding a motor vehicle accident. This case, Antonio-Lopez-MVA-11-14-2025, concerns an incident that occurred on November 14, 2025, at the intersection of Eaton and Dixie Highway, where Lopez was rear-ended at a traffic light.

Antonio Lopez, date of birth November 9, 1997, with SSn 337-94-7156 and phone number 502-701-5196, reports residence at 5056 Minette Court, Apt 3, 40258. He is a PIP Progressive claimant, Claim # 25695180369. A civilian report was completed. He went to UofL downtown following the accident and reports injuries of mid and lower back pain.

Also listed in the case is Michae Guyton (Mich-Shae), born August 6, 1997, with SSN 330-94-6903 and phone number 502-701-5196. Michae Guyton was seen at UofL Hospital with injuries including back pain and pain in both shoulders.

A’zaire Lopez is listed with DOB March 22, 2022 and SSN 687-56-7027, who attended UofL Hospital. Mi’ayla Lopez is listed with DOB January 25, 2025 and SSN 097-29-8972, who attended UofL as well.

The person making contact is Justin, and the date and time of this contact is November 17, 2025.

episodes.natural_language:
This case involves Antonio Lopez in a motor vehicle accident, docketed as Antonio-Lopez-MVA-11-14-2025, with Antonio Lopez identified as the client.

The note from the Whaley Law Firm reads: "It's Justin from the Whaley Law Firm. Send copy of report here along with plate info," instructing that a copy of the report be sent to this location along with the vehicle’s plate information.
